description:
Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakuten e no Hisaku: Nightmare Luffy Kenzan
The Secret Plan to Turn the Tables! Nightmare Luffy Makes His Appearance!
Un plan secret pour tout renverser ! L’apparition de Nightmare Luffy !
Безумная стратегия перевоплощения. Появление Кошмарного Луффи
الخطّة السريّة لقلب الطاولة! ظهور الكابوس لوفي!
逆転への秘策 ナイトメア・ルフィ見参
